title: Samantha Armytage is spotted visiting popular wedding venue
text:
She recently celebrated her boyfriend's 60th birthday at an intimate luncheon with his friends and family.

And it seems Samantha Armytage may be preparing for a big celebration of her own, after she was spotted visiting a popular wedding venue in Melbourne last week.

The Sunrise presenter, 43, left fans wondering whether she and Richard are planning to tie the knot after she shared an Instagram photo from Como House, a historic property in South Yarra, last Monday

The perfect place to say 'I do'! Samantha Armytage visited a popular wedding venue last week amid rumours she is ready to marry boyfriend Richard Lavender. Pictured together last month

Surrounded by manicured gardens, Como House features a royal ballroom and glamorous pavilion that could serve as the perfect backdrop for Sam's special day.

The colonial mansion also has sentimental value to Sam, whose wealthy ancestors lived there for nearly a century before selling it to the National Trust.

Sam first sparked engagement rumours last month after she and Richard were spotted shopping at high-end jewellery stores in Sydney's Double Bay.

What a venue! The Sunrise presenter, 43, left fans wondering whether she and Richard are planning to tie the knot after she shared an Instagram photo from Como House, a historic property in South Yarra (pictured), last Monday

However, sources close to Sam later said they were shopping for her '43rd birthday present' and not an engagement ring.

The couple visited stores such as Cerrone and Jan Logan, before reportedly picking out a pair of earrings.

Meanwhile, Sam's friends and family are said to be happy about her new relationship, with an insider describing him as a 'good guy'.

Idyllic: Surrounded by manicured gardens, Como House (pictured) features a royal ballroom and glamorous pavilion that could serve as the perfect backdrop for Sam's special day

Close to her heart: The colonial mansion also has sentimental value to Sam, whose wealthy ancestors lived there for nearly a century before selling it to the National Trust

The pair are believed to have met at Skye Leckie's 60th birthday party in April.

Richard lives in the country town of Bowral, where Sam happens to own a $2.2million five-bedroom property.

They reportedly spend most weekends together, with Sam living at her $2.15million Bondi home during the week.
